name: Champagne & Rose scented candles in upcycled wine glasses
description:
Beautiful, upcycled glasses, with flower design and rose coloured bottom, filled with hand poured soy candle wax, which gives a longer and cleaner burn.

Great scent throw.

Perfect, unique gift, handcrafted by vintage gems. Shown with mini liqueur glasses, with are Â£8 per pair.
